Bug fixes and UI improvements
Group call extend up to 5 participants. Any PRO participant in group call can invite a new participant. File sharing UI improved. General UI improvements. Bug fixes.
Bug fixes and UI improvements
Added the ability to paste GIFs directly into the chat
Added the ability to preview documents Fixed minor bugs
Fixed minor UI bugs Improved performance
Fixed rare crash on sharing photos from gallery Improved performance
Improved chat UI Added ability to send GIF images Added file previews in chat
Fixed bug that caused Stealthtalk Call to break because of cellular call
Fixed a rare bug that caused sent messages to be re sent. Improved appearance of icons of file transfer.
Fixed rare crash on launch
Added file transfer feature Enabled external sharing ability Improved application performance Fixed bugs
Bugfixes
Added send files feature Bug fixes and performance improvements
Fixed the bug that caused the incoming message notification sound to be played multiple times.
Improved application launch time
Bugfixes Improved incoming call ui

Updated and reworked user authentication throughout the application. Authentication is now required to launch open the app. Users are required to enter their account passcode when they first launch the application. Face ID Touch ID is used to unlock open the app that has been running in background.
Fixed rare crash occurred while user phone number validating. Fixed crash that users occasionally faced when they moved back during registration process. Improved image quality in chats
Account registration step Set recovery information became skippable Fixed bugs
Fixed bugs Improved performance
Updated and simplified the account access restoration process. Fixed bugs.
Introduced FREE and PRO subscription plans Added support for in app purchases Improved new Stealth Mode visuals Fixed a bug that caused some users to receive duplicated incoming calls

Fixed a crash that occurred when a user that is not on contact list was added to a group call. Resolved the voice delay issue that occurred after losing and then regaining connection to a call. Resolved the issue that caused the app to freeze during startup if a WiFi network had no internet connection. Fixed a counter of unread messages on the application icon. Improved design of the chat text input.
Added a busy tone that indicates that the connection is occupied Resolved the issue that caused a crash when decrypting a message Fixed other minor bugs
Added auto reconnect feature that regains connection during a call after network connection fails. Fixed bugs.
Fixed crash that occurred among some users right after the registration Reduced registration steps
Added predefined security questions. Fixed unread messages counter badge. Fixed crash related to long tap on settings tab. Minor User Interface improvements.
Sign in code can be copied by long tap Improved secure call reliability Improved UI across the app Fixed bug that prevented showing seen state on images in some cases
Resolved the call issue preventing users from hearing each other during a call Improved UI across the app Fixed some bugs
Updated access to account settings Added a new application settings tab Improved performance and stability
Improved the Sign in codes feature. Sign in codes are now displayed in the notification Improved localization Fixed minor bugs to improve stability
Resolved the issue that prevented push notifications from showing up when the application is closed Fixed a number of minor bugs to improve application stability and performance

Improved the Sign in codes feature. StealthTalk now sends you a notification with your website Sign in code and no longer requires Stealth mode to preview the code Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
Improved stability Fixed some bugs
Fixed a number of minor issues and bugs Improved localization

Fixed the issue that prevented call and message notifications from showing up Added a One Time Password OTP feature for secure sign in to your personal account on StealthTalk.com Bug fixes and stability improvements
Improved localization across the app Updated loading status messages

StealthTalk has an unswerving commitment to security. We update the app to improve reliability and ensure your privacy. Here are the enhancements you will find in this update: Improved Invite feature. You may now send invitations via IMs and social networks Added onboarding cards Fixed QR contact sharing layout Improved localization across the app Minor bug fixes and performance improvements If you have any questions or suggestions you can contact us at support stealthtalk.com

StealthTalk has an unswerving commitment to security. We update the app to improve reliability and ensure your privacy. Here are the enhancements you will find in this update: New dark UI! Fixed stability issues on iOS 13.2 Improved localization across the app Fixed the tab bar display issue on iPhone XR Minor bug fixes and performance improvements If you have any questions or suggestions you can contact us at support stealthtalk.com
Minor fixes and performance improvements
Added Account Protection information to restore auhtoization passcode.
Various bug fixes
